title: Change looping implementation
message:
Change looping implementation

Instead of using the MediaPlayer looping functionality, start the media
player from the beginning - we need this to start the control row
progress from the beginning due to the non-gapless playback. Hopefully
this can be fixed / implemented better in the next release.

title: Fix previous skip button
message: Fix previous skip button

title: Only send custom action if skip is pressed
message:
Only send custom action if skip is pressed

Only send the custom action for a skip event if the skip button is
pressed by the user.

title: Remove isPlaying() check
message:
Remove isPlaying() check

This causes an illegalStateException.

title: Don't finish activity when recogniser is cancelled
message:
Don't finish activity when recogniser is cancelled

The search activity was bering finished if the recogniser was being
cancelled.

title: Do not call 'Submit' on speach search
message:
Do not call 'Submit' on speach search

Query text change callback is triggered so we don’t need to call the
submit search callback

Removed Log

title: Add try again / reload ability
message:
Add try again / reload ability

Added a try again / reload card to the MainFragment. Now:

- If there is an error then a try again card will be shown (only if the
list is empty)
- If the list is not empty, then a toast will be shown
- If there are no results and the list is empty (upon a successful
request) then a check again card will be shown
